members.joinCircumstances: Franky is introduced as the leader of the Franky Family.
Zambai is introduced as Franky's right-hand man and most prominent subordinate.
Kiwi is introduced as one of the Square Sisters who are loyal to Franky.
Mozu is introduced as one of the Square Sisters who are loyal to Franky.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family is introduced celebrating at Franky House after stealing 200 million berries from the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the Franky Family as antagonists in the Water 7 arc.

keyMoments.title: Celebration with Stolen Money
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family celebrates their theft, showing their nature of quickly spending money on parties.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the carefree, party-loving character of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Attack on Usopp
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family is revealed to have beaten Usopp and stolen the Straw Hats' 200 million berries.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes them as enemies of the Straw Hat Pirates.

bases.description: Franky House serves as the headquarters and base of operations for the Franky Family.

keyMoments.title: Learning the Going Merry Cannot Be Saved
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats receive the devastating news that their beloved ship, the Going Merry, has a broken keel and cannot be repaired.
keyMoments.significance: A heartbreaking moment that will lead to internal conflict within the crew.

keyMoments.title: 200 Million Berries Stolen
keyMoments.description: The crew discovers that 200 million berries have been stolen from them by the Franky Family.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a major problem as they needed this money to buy a new ship.

ships.description: The crew's first ship, now discovered to be irreparable due to a broken keel.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
